# Abalone Gene Expression Dataset
*Amelia Papa November 2020*
The data for this project comes from the following paper by JCU researchers and was analysed as part of a university course called BC5203: Advanced Bioinformatics, 
coordinated by Ira Cooke.

### Load the necessary libraries

```{R}
library(readr)
library(DESeq2)
counts <- read_tsv("count_table.tsv")
metadata <- read_tsv("metadata.tsv")
```
